thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Faubourg 88 - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean and modern hotel in good location
thread.title_full: Clean and modern hotel in good location - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Faubourg 88, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: phr123
title: Clean and modern hotel in good location
text:
Positive:
- Front Desk friendly + English speaking
- Clean and modern room
- nice bathroom with rainbow shower
- comfortable large bed
- subway very closeby
Negative:
- room rather small (for Paris it was quite ok)
- not enough seats for breakfast
- no own parking, but 50% discount in a parking garage nearby
